main.first: Welcome to the Privacy Policy of the website https://vse-bude.com.ua. The Privacy Policy outlined below will inform you about the main issues regarding the protection and processing of your personal data.
main.second: This Policy was developed in accordance with the requirements of the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR; Regulation (EU) 2016/679), the Law of Ukraine 'On the Protection of Personal Data' and other normative acts of Ukrainian legislation that regulate legal relations, related to the collection, processing, and storage of personal data, as well as the right of citizens to non-interference in personal life and the right to self-expression.

forWho.first: This Policy applies to all persons who, in the process of using the site, provided their own personal data. Personal data is information or a set of information about a natural person who is identified or can be specifically identified.
forWho.second: The site is NOT intended for children under the age of 18, and we do not knowingly collect personal data from children under the age of 18 without parental consent. If you are under 18, please do not submit your personal data.

list.fourth: URL of your pages in social networks.

whatWeGet.first: The owner (controller) and administrator (processor/operator) of your personal data is Binary Studio LLC.

cookie.first: During the operation of the site, we may collect certain information using technologies such as cookies. With the help of cookies, the web server stores preferences and settings on your computer, mobile phone or other device(s), which is then automatically restored the next time you visit the site, making its use more convenient.

why.first: The personal data provided by you will be used in the process of preparing for and directly conducting on the website a charity online auction to help the Ukraine, including:

list.first: to send notifications/messages regarding user registration by the auction participant, including sending a message with a one-time password for authorization on the site;
list.second: to inform about the status of lots and auction results;
list.third: to initiate user communication for the purpose of selling the lot by transferring the contact information of the auction winner to the owner of the lot.

howWeSave.first: All received information will be stored and processed in our cloud-based database.
howWeSave.second: We retain your data for as long as necessary for the purposes specified in this Privacy Policy. Sometimes we may retain your data for a longer period as permitted or required by law.
howWeSave.third: We take all necessary measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, modification, disclosure or destruction. At the same time, we draw your attention to the fact that none of the existing methods of data transmission can be completely secure. Therefore, despite all security measures taken, we cannot guarantee complete security of information and data.

thirdParties.first: Your personal information will be shown on the information page of the lot/product.
thirdParties.second: We may also disclose and/or transfer personal data to third parties in the following cases:

list.first: Obtaining your consent to such disclosure/transfer;
list.second: In case of involvement of third parties that provide technical support and/or services for the improvement of the site under the terms of the contract and under the condition of non-disclosure of personal data;
list.third: In the interests of national security, economic well-being and human rights, in particular, but not limited to reasonable requests by government authorities that have the right to submit applications and receive such data;
list.fourth: For the administration of justice, execution of a court act, an act of another body or an official, subject to execution in accordance with the legislation of Ukraine on executive proceedings;
